mapper.sql: ID, LOGIN_NAME as 'loginName', NAME, PASSWORD, SALT, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, EMAIL, PHONE, ICON, CREATE_DATE as 'createTime', STATE, LOGIN_COUNT as 'loginCount', PREVIOUS_VISIT as 'previousVisit', LAST_VISIT as 'lastVisit', DEL_FLAG as 'delFlag', DESCRIPTION
mapper.delete: delete user from user,user_role,user_org where user.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into user
ID,
LOGIN_NAME,
NAME,
PASSWORD,
SALT,
BIRTHDAY,
GENDER,
EMAIL,
PHONE,
ICON,
CREATE_DATE,
STATE,
LOGIN_COUNT,
PREVIOUS_VISIT,
LAST_VISIT,
DEL_FLAG,
DESCRIPTION,

mapper.update:
update user
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALT = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
LOGIN_COUNT = #{loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PREVIOUS_VISIT = #{previousVisit,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_VISIT = #{lastVisit,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
